1.eng-name: The Book of Purification and its Sunnah

hadiths.text: It was narrated from Abu Buraidah from his father that:An-Najashi gave the Prophet a gift of a pair of plain black leather socks. He put them on, then he (performed ablution and) wiped over them

chapter.ara-name: باب مَا جَاءَ فِي الْمَسْحِ عَلَى الْخُفَّيْنِ
